year.description: The year of the record. The dataset includes records from 2011 and 2012

value_dict.2012: The record is from the year 2012
value_dict.2011: The record is from the year 2011

hour.description: The hour of the day when the record was made. It ranges from 0 (midnight) to 23 (11 PM)

season.description: The season of the year. It is represented as a number from 1 to 4

holiday.description: Whether the day is a holiday or not. It is represented as a binary value where 0 means it is not a holiday and 1 means it is a holiday

value_dict.0: The day is not a holiday

workingday.description: Whether the day is a working day or not. It is represented as a binary value where 0 means it is not a working day and 1 means it is a working day

value_dict.0: The day is not a working day
value_dict.1: The day is a working day

weather.description: The weather condition. It is represented as a number from 1 to 4

value_dict.3: The weather condition is light rain or snow

humidity.description: The humidity level. It is represented as a percentage

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in bike rental prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the bike rental data, please predict the count of bike rentals.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted count of bike rentals is {count}.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in weather forecasting.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the bike rental data, please predict the temperature.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted temperature is {temp} degree Celsius.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in weather forecasting.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the bike rental data, please predict the feeling temperature.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted feeling temperature is {atemp} degree Celsius.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in weather forecasting.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the bike rental data, please predict the humidity.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in weather forecasting.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the bike rental data, please predict the wind speed.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted wind speed is {windspeed} km/h.
